Package org.ejbca.ui.web.admin

Class BaseManagedBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ejbca.ui.web.admin.BaseManagedBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AccessRulesBean, AcmeConfigMBean, AdminMenuBean, ApprovalProfileMBean, ApprovalProfilesMBean, ApproveActionManagedBean, CAActivationMBean, CertProfileBean, CertProfilesBean, CryptoTokenMBean, CustomCertExtensionMBean, EditServiceManagedBean, InternalKeyBindingMBean, ListApproveActionManagedBean, ListServicesManagedBean, RoleMembersBean, RolesBean, ScepConfigMBean, SystemConfigMBean, UpgradeBean, ValidatorBean, ValidatorsBean
    public abstract class BaseManagedBean
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Base EJBCA JSF Managed Bean, all managed beans of EJBCA should inherit this class
    Version:
    $Id: BaseManagedBean.java 29589 2018-08-08 12:02:53Z bastianf $

        protected Map<String,​Object> getPublicConstantsAsMap​(Class<?> classObject)
        Return the public constants of classObject as a Map, so they can be referenced from the JSF page. (The implementation caches the Map for subsequent calls.)

      • nonAjaxPostRedirectGet

        protected void nonAjaxPostRedirectGet​(String requestString)
        Perform a post-redirect-get if the requests is not invoked via AJAX to the current view id with the specified request string appended. It will try to preserve FacesMessages using the bug-riddled Flash scope.
        Parameters:
        requestString - String
